message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product, and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can you meet me there?

I appreciate your interest, Bob. While $12,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $17,000. This product truly offers exceptional value, and I believe it will exceed your expectations.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we meet at $14,000?
